opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2013, the Notice of Appeal is quashed.
Mr. Justice Saylor dissents, as he would note probable jurisdiction and direct expedited treatment for appeal proceedings.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
